title: Illithid Powers
content: ry Sonshal at Felogyr's Fireworks, Baldur's Gate Lower City. Two can be found on Enver Gortash's Parents, the Flymms (X-30, Y-116), Baldur's Gate Lower City. One can be found in High Security Safe n6 (near X-715, Y882) in the high-security vault of Counting House. One can be found sitting on a table on the ground floor of Sorcerous Sundries (X-8, Y-91). One can be found on the second floor of The Lodge. (X-207, Y-87) One on a table in the Sanguine Laboratory, entered from Baldur's Gate's Lower C
